cases.name: Eliminate mix-ups and errors
cases.notes: Cassette and container mismatch?  The Sentinel is constantly reading all labeling and will lock out and notify the user if a mismatch occurs
cases.imageNotes: he Sentinel monitors all tissue before, during and after transfer from the container to the cassette ensuring no tissue is lost or left behind
